details.text:
```json
{
  "selected_agents": [
    "WebSearchAnalyst"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "BERT",
    "blog post",
    "summary",
    "Slack post"
  ],
  "reason": "The user is asking to search for a blog post about BERT, summarize it, and post it to Slack. WebSearchAnalyst has the capability to perform web searches, fetch web pages, summarize content, and post to Slack. No other agent is needed."
}
```
